mean_cn: n. 游行；示威活动；示威；实物示教；实物说明；示范表演；演示；表现
mean_en: an event in which people gather together in order to show that they support or oppose something or someone
word_etyma: demonstrat示威游行 + ion名词后缀 → demonstration 示威游行
sentence: They organized a demonstration to gain attention.
sentence_trans: 为了得到关注，他们组织了游行。
